OOC: Airly, tell me if you think any of this is moding, and i will change it.

:::Wheeljack:::

::He goes to his computer::
Wheeljack: Computer, save memory.
Computer: Acknowledged
::Essentially what he's done is saved Vamprah's old body onto his computer, 
so when she returns from her mission she can be easily converted back to her 
old self.  He takes his new gadget and attatches it to Vamprah and presses a 
button. Her superstructure turns to liquid metal, like a protoform::
Wheeljack: So far, so good.  Now for the tricky part.
::He takes the owl parts Vamprah has found and starts laying them out on her 
liquid form, creating an owl form, and, just as Vamprah asked for, she was 
very beautiful::
Wheeljack: Excellent. Now to reactivate her.
::He presses a button::
Wheeljack: Welcome, Minerva.

--part1_bd.1206b9b3.289d85e5_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
